item.description:
Will Tuttle will be giving a presentation on the theories and ideas he expresses in his book "The World Peace Diet" at Worcester's Loving Hut Chandler.

The World Peace Diet has been reviewed in VegNews, in which Tuttle was said to "...lift the discussion of veganism to a higher level. He argues cogently for a spiritual component, one where the consequence of using and consuming animals, so ubiquitous in human society, affects us not only in ways that can be measured physically, but spiritually as well.

Dr. Will Tuttle is a long time vegan, and lover of animals and peace. He is also the author of a #1 best selling book entitled The World Peace Diet. In his presentation he will be discussing his thoughts and insights he expresses in his book. There will be a question and answer portion to his presentation. Its a great opportunity to meet a beautiful and wise being.

A vegan buffet will follow the presentation. The presentation is free, and there is an optional vegan buffet to follow which is $10.00 - all you can eat, vegan asian cuisine.

To RSVP: Call 401-403-1954 Contact Allison Joyal or call The Loving Hut for more info, and also please RSVP on Facebook at:

https://www.facebook.com/events/281372901956651/

Â
item.how_to_find_us: Park on the street and come on in.
item.name: Will Tuttle of "World Peace Diet" Lecture/Presentation
